name: Doggy Dodge
description:
I recently decided to start learning game development using Godot and this is my first game I'm publishing, as you can tell I'm not too advanced yet but I hope to work on bigger projects soon. Feel free to support me and the game, I might update the game a tiny bit in the near future.

Credits: Artwork: 25Inches Character Programming: 25Inches, My dad Sound: 25Inches (with special help from my dog Rufus)
